Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2253 affecting package cert-manager for versions less than 1.11.2-14
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-2253 affecting package cert-manager for versions less than 1.11.2-14. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cert-manager is earlier than 1.11.2-14, affected by CVE-2023-2253
